tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  address VARCHAR(100),
  last_visit TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender CHAR(1),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15) UNIQUE
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
    doctor_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    reason_for_visit TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT unique_appointment UNIQUE (patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  patient_email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  patient_birthdate DATE,
  patient_contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  appointment_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE doctors (
  doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  doctor_specialty VARCHAR(50),
  doctor_contact_number VARCHAR(15),
  doctor_email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE
);

CREATE TABLE doctors (
  doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  specialization VARCHAR(100),
  years_of_experience INT,
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  record_date TIMESTAMP,
  record_text TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE doctors (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialty VARCHAR(50),
  years_of_experience INT
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  doctor_id UUID,
  appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
  completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  appointment_id UUID,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50),
  dosage VARCHAR(20),
  instructions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  medical_condition TEXT,
  diagnosis_date DATE,
  treatment_plan TEXT
);
